reviewText: Bronco la historia de el gigante de america rocks. Because its the greatest show of all time. I mean the videos they perform were shot in different places. Sony music latin la historia de el gigante de america dvd video. Actuacionces con los mas grandes exitos de todo su carrera desde bronco a gigantes de america incluyendo: adoro que no queda huella amigo bronco con zapatos de tacon sergio el bailador oro and los castigados. El tema de la telenovela: does mujeres in Camino y mas. The songs that bronco la historia del gigante de america performed begins with track one is adoro, track two amigo bronco, track 3 con zapatos de taxon, track four does mujeres in Camino, track five los castigados, track six nunca voy a olvidarte, track seven oro, track eight el sheriff de chocolate, track 9 que no queda huella, and track 10 sergio el bailador. In my own words these videos were performed and shot in different parts of mexico. The copyright is sony music latin and televisa home entertainment. Compilation 2009 sony music entertainment. When you buy directly from amazon $35.00 and over your order qualifies for free shipping when you add up all the orders that the people bought directly from amazon.com I just want to tell the amazon.com customers that they could buy whatever they want. I'm not forcing nobody to buy off of amazon.com its the peoples choice and they could buy off directly from amazon or from another buyer off the amazon.com website. When you do buy directly off amazon.com brand new you are guaranteed to have the item brand new wrapped in plastic 100% rating. Any item that is fulfilled by amazon.com will be wrapped in plastic like if the rating is 99%, 98%, 97% and 96% positive rating. Anything lower the amazon.com customers will be taking a big chance on buying the item and it has to say from the buyer wrapped brand new in plastic. That means the item is still sealed in plastic from amazon.com when you buy directly from a third party site from amazon.com that it is wrapped in plastic. If it's not wrapped in plastic make sure you send the item back to amazon.com the direct buyer and ask for credit or make sure you send the item back right away to amazon.com so you directly get credit on your account or make an even exchange for the same item. When you buy directly from a third party website you directly will have to ask for credit for the item. That means you will get partial credit for the item because it's not fulfilled by amazon.com like one of the video games I bought directly from a third party site because the instruction booklet was missing. That could go the same way with the music dvd. That means the item is opened and the disc is missing for bronco la his tora de el gigante de America. I'm just trying to set an example for the amazon.com customers of what could happen. Thats all for now and gracias.
My boyfriend and i loved. The dvd made it more than desirable the just a cd. He shared it with his brothers wo now want to order dvds versus cds. I gave them the amazon.com address.

I had 2 issues with this DVD:

1. I thought the songs will be the actual video clips they recorded, but instead every single song is part of their performance within a Mexican TV Show called "En Vivo".
So, the quality of the video is old, the sound is not good, and I can't even hear the whole song because people are clapping their hands and singing along.

2. The DVD came deffective.
Video displays intermitent in some songs.
On "track 5" los castigados, it plays like -10 seconds of the song and it jumps right back to the menu.
